org.lightsleep.helper

Class TypeConverter<ST,DT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightsleep.helper.TypeConverter<ST,DT>

  • public class TypeConverter<ST,DT>
extends java.lang.Object
    TypeConverter class has two types (source and destination) and a function to perform data conversion.

    This class has a static maps (key: a combination of source type and destination type, value: a TypeConverterobject). It is initialized with the contents of the following table at the time of class initialization.

    Registered contents of the TypeConverter map
    Key: Data TypesValue: Conversion Function
    SourceDestination
    Byte Boolean false if the source value is 0
    true if the source value is 1
    Throws a ConvertException otherwise
    Short
    Integer
    Long
    Float
    Double
    BigDecimal
    Character false if the source value is '0'
    true if the source value is '1'
    Throws a ConvertException otherwise
    Boolean Byte 0 if the source value is false
    1 if the source value is true
    Short
    Throws a ConvertException if the source value is out of byte range.
    Integer
    Long
    Float
    Double
    BigDecimal
    Character
    Boolean Short 0 if the source value is false
    1 if the source value is true
    Byte
    Integer
    Throws a ConvertException if the source value is out of short range.
    Long
    Float
    Double
    BigDecimal
    Character
    Boolean Integer 0 if the source value is false
    1 if the source value is true
    Byte
    Short
    Long
    Throws a ConvertException if the source value is out of int range.
    Float
    Double
    BigDecimal
    Character
    java.util.Date java.util.Date Long Integer
    Throws a ConvertException if the long value is out of int range.
    LocalTime LocalTime Long Integer
    Throws a ConvertException if the long value is out of int range.

    1L if the source value is true

    LocalTime
    OffsetDateTimesource.toInstant()

    StringBoolean false if the source value is "0"
    true if the source value is "1"
    Throws a ConvertException otherwise
    Byte <destination class>.valueOf(source)
    Throws a ConvertException if the valueOf method throws a NumberFormatException.
    Short
    Integer
    Long
    Float
    Double
    BigDecimal new BigDecimal(source)
    Throws a ConvertException if the BigDecimal constructor throws a NumberFormatException.
    Character source.charAt(0)
    Throws a ConvertException if the source length is not 1.
    LocalDateTime <destination class>.parse(source, DateTimeFormatter object)
    Throws a ConvertException if the parse method throws a DateTimeParseException.
    The format string of the DateTimeFormatter object is below.
     
    yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss,
    yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S,... or
    yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSS if convert to LocalDateTime or Timestamp
     
    yyyy-MM-dd if convert to LocalDate or Date
     
    HH:mm:ss,
    HH:mm:ss.S,... or
    HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSS if convert to LocalTime or Time
     
    yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssxxx,
    yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.Sxxx,... or
    yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSSxxx if convert to OffsetDateTime
     
    yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss[ ]VV,
    yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S[ ]VV,... or
    yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSSS[ ]VV if convert to ZonedDateTime

      static <ST,DT> TypeConverter<ST,DT> get(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterMap, java.lang.Class<ST> sourceType, java.lang.Class<DT> destinType)
      Finds and returns a TypeConverter to convert sourceType to destinType in typeConverterMap.
      If can not find TypeConverter to match with sourceType and destinType, finds a TypeConverter to match with interfaces of sourceType and destinType.
      If still can not find, finds a TypeConverter to match with super classes of sourceType and destinType.
      If still can not find, returns null

      • put

        public static void put(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterMap,
                       TypeConverter<?,?> typeConverter)
        Puts the typeConverter in the typeConverterMap.
        Parameters:
        typeConverterMap - the TypeConverter map
        typeConverter - the TypeConverter
        Throws:

      • get

        public static <ST,DT> TypeConverter<ST,DT> get(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterMap,
                                               java.lang.Class<ST> sourceType,
                                               java.lang.Class<DT> destinType)
        Finds and returns a TypeConverter to convert sourceType to destinType in typeConverterMap.
        If can not find TypeConverter to match with sourceType and destinType, finds a TypeConverter to match with interfaces of sourceType and destinType.
        If still can not find, finds a TypeConverter to match with super classes of sourceType and destinType.
        If still can not find, returns null
        . If found with in the super class or interface, puts them in typeConverterMap to be found directly next time.
        Type Parameters:
        ST - the type of the source
        DT - the type of the destination
        Parameters:
        typeConverterMap - the TypeConverter map
        sourceType - the type of the source
        destinType - the type of the destination
        Returns:
        a TypeConverter
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - typeConverterMap, sourceType or destinType is null

      • convert

        public static <ST,DT> DT convert(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterMap,
                                 ST source,
                                 java.lang.Class<DT> destinType)
        If source == null, returns null
        Otherwise if destinType.isInstance(source), Returns source without converting. Otherwise if found a TypeConverter, Returns an object converted the source by the converter.
        Type Parameters:
        ST - the type of the source
        DT - the type of the destination
        Parameters:
        typeConverterMap - the TypeConverter map
        source - a source object (permit null)
        destinType - a destination type (other than primitive types)
        Returns:
        a converted object (might be null)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if typeConverterMap or destinType is null
        ConvertException - if can not find the converter or the accuracy is lowered in the conversion
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if destinType is a primitive type

      • typeConverterMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterMap()
        Returns an unmodifiable TypeConverter map where various TypeConverter objects are registered.
        Returns:
        the unmodifiable TypeConverter map
        Since:
        1.8.1
